Key Match Events: Jhoan Duran allowed four runs (three earned) in the top of the 10th inning, erasing a rally that tied the game 4-4
Marcel Ozuna hit a 101 mph double, followed by a 105.4 mph single from Travis d'Arnaud and a 101.7 mph fastball for a 104.7 mph double from Ramon Laureano
Post-Match Reflections: The loss sends the Twins 2.5 games behind the Royals and Guardians, who are tied atop the AL Central
The Twins have lost seven of the last nine games
Minnesota's 4.75 bullpen ERA over the last nine games ranks 23rd in the majors
They've blown two saves and have a 1.47 WHIP that ranks 27th in that span
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins rallied in the eighth inning to tie the game 4-4 with three runs in the seventh and one more in the eighth
Matt Wallner struck out with two runners on to end the game
